meanings.definition: A medical instrument used to examine the inside of the uterus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a hysteroscope to look inside the uterus.
meanings.sent2: The hysteroscope helped the doctor see the inside of the uterus clearly.
meanings.sent3: During the examination, the hysteroscope made the uterus look like a tiny tunnel.
meanings.sent4: The hysteroscope was like a tiny magical telescope revealing the secrets of the uterus.
meanings.sent5: With the hysteroscope, the uterus appeared like a mysterious cavern waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: To examine the uterus using a hysteroscope.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will hysteroscope the patient to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: She hysteroscoped the uterus carefully to ensure everything was normal.
meanings.sent3: The nurse jokingly said she could hysteroscope in her sleep after so much practice.
meanings.sent4: He hysteroscoped through the lens, uncovering the hidden details of the uterus.
meanings.sent5: Hysteroscoping the uterus felt like exploring a mysterious cave with a special tool.
